Articles.Content:
So I found this on the forums http://imgur.com/a/LfeuR#1 (credit to whoever built it)

and then I turned into an intercontinental ramjet platform

http://imgur.com/a/LfeuR#2

It can be a bit unstable higher up, around 25km, but as long as you don't do anything too drastic it handles fine. Max speed so far, ~1310m/s, max altitude ~41km The rocket boosters get you to around 10,000m at a 60 degree angle.

Edited August 4, 2012 by Morrigi
fixed broken pictures
